text: Rihanna got herself a hunky boyfriend but her ex - lover, Drake, doesn't think she deserves the dude. After the Barbadian singer heated up the internet with her photos with Hassan Jameel, the Canadian rapper reportedly reacted and said that he is wondering why his former girlfriend fell for the Arabian business tycoon. Drake is reportedly starting to regret letting go of RiRi A source told Hollywood Life that the ` ` Thank Me Later'' artist was ` ` kinda jealous'' when he found out that his ex - girlfriend is already seeing a new guy. “ Drake is kinda jealous of Rihanna ’ s new billionaire boyfriend. He has no idea why she likes this guy, ” it said. It added that despite their on - off relationship, the 30 - year - old rapper is
